summary: Completed frontend testing of NexaClinq medical application. Fixed critical RxDB regex query issue in DrugSelector. Verified login functionality, practice switching, and database seeding. Drug search functionality partially working but not returning results despite successful queries.

ui_bugs.issue: Drug search returns 'Nenhum medicamento encontrado' despite successful database queries and seeded data

integration_issues.issue: RxDB regex query error (QU16) was causing search failures - FIXED
TemplatesManager component not accessible through main navigation - no direct route found

passed_tests: Database initialization and seeding (drugs and templates loaded successfully)
Practice switching between VET and MD modes
Navigation between main sections (Pacientes, Banco de Medicamentos, Laborat√≥rio, Financeiro)
Search input field interaction and text entry

critical_issues: Drug search functionality: Despite fixing RxDB regex query error, search still returns no results. Need to investigate why seeded drugs are not being returned by queries.
TemplatesManager accessibility: No direct navigation route found to access TemplatesManager component. Need to add navigation or integrate into existing flows.
Drug filtering by practice: Unable to verify if practice-based filtering works correctly due to search returning no results.
verification_needed: Verify that drug database seeding is actually persisting data correctly
Check if there are additional database query issues beyond the regex problem
Implement or expose TemplatesManager in the main navigation
Test DrugSelector component in prescription flows where it should be used
